id.title: Record Identifier
id.description: A unique record identifier assigned by the server.

updated.title: Updated
updated.description: The more recent date on which the resource was changed.

area.title: Spatial area of the resource
area.description: This is a synthetic sortable that the server computes on the fly based on the spatial extent of the resource.  Resources without spatial extent have zero area.

extent.title: Spatio-Temporal Extent
extent.description: The spatio-temporal coverage of the resource.
